title: Large group of 28 t207 NAPOLEON backs available -- $2800 [NOW SOLD!!]
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Large group of 28 t207 NAPOLEON backs available -- $2800 [NOW SOLD!!]
posts.post_content:
Not easy cards to come by and I've spent a few years putting this group together.  Time for someone else to enjoy them.  There are 28 cards in this collection altogether of various grades.  No bad looking cards in the group at all and none have any back damage at all.  Many of these fall into the 30-40 range with a couple higher.

One note, the Daniels has a blue "ghosted" silhouette on top of the card.  Possibly a wet-sheet transfer but kind of interesting.

Asking $2800 delivered.  Scans available upon request.  Thanks much!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
Callahan VG - faint corner wrinkle, sharp corners
John Collins SGC A - wrinkling
Cole EX - sharp corners/edges, no wrinkling
Covington VG - no wrinkling..only tiny touches to corners
Daniels FR - neat blue GHOSTING on front....2 heavier wrinkles

Derrick GAI 3
Devlin SGC 30

Gowdy SGC A - nice looking card with some wrinkling

Hogan VG/EX - no wrinkling, very sharp corners...tiny bit of chipping
Konetchy - SGC 30
Lapp SGC 10 - wrinkling
McIntyre VG - no wrinkling..only tiny touches to corners
Needham VG+ - slight touches to corners, no wrinkling

Schardt SGC 10 - wrinkling
Severoid SGC 40
